name: Super Press The Button Simulator 2019
description:
The Hit New Game of 2019 is Here! Now you can finally simulate pressing a large, circular button from the comfort of your own home. Watch as the button is magically pressed as you press the space-bar on your real keyboard!

DISCLAIMER 1:

This game is not meant to be taken seriously, only as a silly waste of time, space and effort. This is also my first game and more of a way to learn C++. SDL and Itch.io than an actual game, it is most likely terribly made and amateurish in nature. But that shouldn't stop you from enjoying the button in all its glory.

Disclaimer 2:

Windows Defender will try to stop the game from running. If this occurs, simply press "more info" when in that screen and you should be able to run the game.
